items.title: Jim Cramer’s Take on UnitedHealth Group (UNH): Bold Predictions for the Future
items.description: We recently compiled a list of the Jim Cramer’s Bold Predictions About These 10 Healthcare Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where UnitedHealth Group Incorporated (NYSE:UNH) stands against the other healthcare stocks Jim Cramer has made bold predictions about. Healthcare has been one of Jim Cramer’s favorite topics lately. […]
